SELECT SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID , SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID , ITEM_VALUE_FLAG , COMPONENT_TYPE , VALUE , SHOW_ORDER ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE SET
SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID ,SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_ITEM_ID ,ITEM_VALUE_FLAG = :ITEM_VALUE_FLAG ,COMPONENT_TYPE = :COMPONENT_TYPE ,VALUE = :VALUE ,SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE_ID AND TS = :TS

UPDATE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_VALUE SET
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID
